title: Violet Evergarden: The Movie
overview: As the world moves on from the war and technological advances bring changes to her life, Violet still hopes to see her lost commanding officer again.
summaries: After the aftermath of a war, a young girl who was used as a 'tool' for war learned to live. With the scars of burns, she goes back to her past to feel the true feelings of the Major's, "I love you."
